thread.title: "Who's Joey Barton?" Antonio Conte is completely miffed when asked about Burnley star ahead of Chelsea game
thread.title_full: "Who's Joey Barton?" Antonio Conte is completely miffed when asked about Burnley star ahead of Chelsea game

author: Jake Polden
title: "Who's Joey Barton?" Antonio Conte is completely miffed when asked about Burnley star ahead of Chelsea game
text:
"Who's Joey Barton?" Antonio Conte is completely miffed when asked about Burnley star ahead of Chelsea game We still don't think this little set back will affect Joey Barton's self-belief one single bit Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Antonio Conte doesn't know who Joey Barton is Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
If there is one person who has confidence in Joey Barton's ability, then it is Joey Barton. 
But it seems Chelsea boss Antonio Conte isn't someone who considers the Burnley midfielder to be much of a threat. 
And how do you know that? You ask. Well the above video should explain. 
The clip shows the Italian speaking ahead of the Blues' Premier League clash at Turf Moor when he is asked about his side's opposition. Who are ya? (Photo: PA) 
Well in particularly he is asked whether he is aware of the one and only Barton. 
And well, he isn't. 
Looking to his assistant for help, a completely baffled Conte can be seen asking: "Who is Joey Barton?" 
It's pretty awkward, and perhaps the answer he receives only makes it worse. Here you go Conte, this is Joey Barton (Photo: PA) 
Instead of trying to explain who Barton is - which probably would have been hilarious - his assistant simplifies the question somewhat. 
"Are you familiar with the Burnley players, or any of the Burnley players in particular?" 
We're guessing he isn't... but it's just a guess mind you. Like us on Facebook
